name: Kirby Whispy Woods Boss Fight
description:
All right are reserved to Nintendo for the use of assets and sound effects from Kirby Super Star Ultra.

I tried to recreate the Whispy Woods boss fight from Kirby Super Star Ultra using Unity. Hope you like it!

Controls: 

LMB- Inhale/exhale

RMB - Shield

WASD - Move

Space - Jump/ puff jump in air (Click LMB in air to puff out)

Inhale the falling apples and launch them at Whispy Woods!
